clauses.title: Equipment Rental
clauses.body: The Owner rents to the Renter the equipment described as: [service_or_property] for the period of [term]. The Renter shall use the equipment only for its intended purpose, in a careful manner, and only by trained operators. The equipment remains the Owner's property.

clauses.title: Rental Fees and Deposit
clauses.body: The rental fee is $[fee] per [day/week/month], payable [in advance/according to schedule]. A security deposit of $[amount] is required and will be refunded within [number] days after equipment return, less any charges for damage, cleaning, or late return.

clauses.title: Renter Care and Use
clauses.body: The Renter shall: maintain the equipment in good condition; use it only for intended purposes; not make alterations; protect it from theft or weather; and return it clean and in working order. The Renter is responsible for routine maintenance and fuel during the rental period.

clauses.title: Damage and Loss
clauses.body: The Renter is liable for all damage or loss regardless of fault. The Renter shall pay repair costs or replacement value for damaged/lost equipment. The Owner is not liable for consequential damages from equipment failure. The Renter should consider separate insurance for valuable equipment.

clauses.title: Return and Late Fees
clauses.body: The Renter shall return the equipment by [date/time] in the same condition. Late returns incur charges at [percentage]% of daily rate. The Owner may terminate and repossess equipment for breach of terms. Early termination does not guarantee refund.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.body: This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California.

annotations.tooltip: Clear responsibility for damage regardless of fault and recommendation for rental insurance.
